description: You can't go wrong with this moreish unbaked cheesecake.
name: Raspberry & Chocolate Flake Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Just before serving, remove the cheesecake from the tin. Cut one of the Flakes into bite size chunks and roughly crumble the other. Arrange the remaining raspberries and the Flake pieces and crumbs on the top of the cheesecake.
